snippet: Red Sox closer Joel Hanrahan needs season-ending surgery on his right forearm, which will require a recovery time of six to nine months.
lead_paragraph: Red Sox closer Joel Hanrahan needs season-ending surgery on his right forearm, which will require a recovery time of six to nine months.

headline.seo: Red Sox Closer Joel Hanrahan Will Miss Season
headline.main: Red Sox Closer Will Miss Season
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Closer Will Miss Season
